example.parse: (NP (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN منع) (NP (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN استخدام) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN الكهرباء))) (PP-PRP (PREP ب) (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN هدف) (NP (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN الصيد)) (PP-LOC (PREP في) (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN مياه) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN النهر))))))))) (NP-PRP (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_INDEF_ACC محافظة)) (PP (PREP على) (NP (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN الاسماك)) (SBAR (SBAR (WHNP-13 (REL_PRON التي)) (S (VP (IV3FS+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:I تتوالد) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-13))))) (CONJ و) (SBAR (WHNP-5 (-NONE- 0)) (S (VP (IV3FS+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:I تتكاثر) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-5)) (PP-LOC (PREP في) (NP (PRON_3MS ه)))))))))))

(S (VP (IV3FS+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:I تتكاثر) (NP-SBJ (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_PL+CASE_DEF_NOM الدعوات)) (PP (PREP الى) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN المعارض) (CONJ و) (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_PL+CASE_DEF_GEN المحاضرات) (CONJ و) (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN الافلام)))))) (PUNC .))

arg.g: Invitations to exhibitions, lectures and films.

example.arg: الدعوات الى المعارض و المحاضرات و الافلام .
